update md
set md_thumbnail_name = '' , md_thumbnail_path = ''
set md_detail_name = '' , md_detail_path = ''
where md_id = #{md_id}
mapper.select: select md_id, md_name, md_oneline, md_price, md_category, md_abv, md_discount , truncate( md_price - (md_price / 100 * md_discount), 0 ) sale_price , md_content, md_thumbnail_name, md_thumbnail_path, md_detail_name, md_detail_path, md_content, md_standard_stock, md_sales_rate, md_stock , md_sweet, md_sour, md_sparkling, md_use, md_ratingAvg from md where md_id = #{md_id}

select count(m.md_id) cnt from md m
where m.md_name like concat('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
where md_category like concat('%', #{searchWord}, '%')

select m.md_id, m.md_name, m.md_price, m.md_category, m.md_standard_stock, m.md_sales_rate, m.md_stock , m.md_thumbnail_name, m.md_thumbnail_path, m.md_onsale from md m
where m.md_name like concat('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
where md_category like concat('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
order by md_id desc limit #{limitNum}, 10
